Pocket Edition Alpha
Bedrock Edition
Cauldrons have an extra, unobtainable item form corresponding to its block ID. This can only seen if the block is assigned an ID with mods.
Cauldron items can be obtained via inventory editors with numeric item ID 118.
Cauldron items can now be obtained in singleplayer worlds via the /give command using the respective numeric ID.
The direct item form of cauldrons has been removed from the game. It can no longer exist as an item in any way, only as a placed block.
Cauldrons probably have an extra item form.
Lava cauldrons have an item form.
Java Edition
Beta 1.9 Prerelease 2
The cauldron item uses this texture in inventories, when held in first or third person view or as a dropped item.
It can only be seen with mods in this version to assign it an item ID, but can be seen in vanilla in Beta 1.9 Prerelease 3 and onwards.
The cauldron item now uses the aforementioned texture when in an item frame.
The cauldron item now uses this texture in inventories, when held in first or third person view, as a dropped item or when in an item frame.
This is due to major texture storage changes in this version.
